key.name: remember-drop-window-position
key.description: If enabled, AppManager reopens the drop window at the last screen coordinates.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Stores the last known width so the preferences window can restore it.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Stores the last known height so the preferences window can restore it.

key.name: auto-check-updates
key.summary: Automatically check for updates in background
key.description: When enabled, AppManager will periodically check for AppImage updates using the XDG Background Portal

key.name: update-check-interval
key.description: How often to check for updates (options: daily=86400, weekly=604800, monthly=2592000)

key.name: last-update-check
key.description: Unix timestamp of the last successful background update check

key.name: background-permission-requested
key.summary: Whether background permission was already requested
key.description: Tracks if the user was already prompted for background permission

key.name: remove-thumbnail-checkerboard
key.description: When enabled, AppManager writes a GTK CSS override to hide the checkered alpha pattern behind thumbnails and icons.
